website_summaries.verdict: An easy and inexpensive last-minute costume, but you'll need to supply your own shirt (that you don't mind not wearing again).
pros: Consist of felt parts and hats for both Mr. and Mrs
Good last-minute costume that is easy to set up
cons: Shirts are not included, just the felt parts
The tape on the felt can leave some residue on shirts, ruining them

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping & overall nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: We received this Mr. & Mrs. Potato Head kit extremely fast (1 day!) and 99% of the kit was in perfect condition/completely as expected. The face pieces are nice quality - thick, felt material, no creases, seemingly nice adhesive. The only "real" issue is that the Mrs. Potato Head hat actually says Mr. instead... It's not a huge deal to me so I'm just going to go over it with a marker & add the 's.' Otherwise, I'm really pleased with the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Katharine Williams

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Inexpensive Costume
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I participated in a Toy Story themed trunk-or-treat. Other Mr. and Mrs. Potato head costumes were way too expensive (around 50-60 a piece!) These stickers were a great solution for those of us wanting to dress up on a budget (without going all out). These are stick ons and hats that do NOT include the shirt. The stickers are sticky enough to stay securely fastened to the shirt. Make sure you use a shirt that you do not mind ruining. We plan to just keep the stickers on the shirts in case we may need the outfits again.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel W

customer_reviews.title: Fun Halloween Costume
customer_reviews.text: It's honestly expensive for what it is, but I had a lot of fun being Mrs. Potato head for Halloween and the experience was priceless.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Serve there purpose but not great product. Daughter was jessie for halloween so this was a cute addition for me and her dad. Stuck to shirts well but left glue when taken off. The "hats" are very cheap and the yellow one said mr potato head instead of mrs.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: crinkled and creased.
customer_reviews.text: The original bag that this product is sold in is not big enough. Because of this, many items have to be folded to fit in it. Since the items are felt stickers, they now forever have a crease where they were folded. Also, The hats were all crinkled and creased. Not fixable... Either they needed to use a different material or they need packaging that will keep the items from being damaged. Since the price is so low I will keep these and make do, but I would prefer to buy something that is not going to have permanent creases and wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: Includes both Mr and Mrs potatoe head. Perfect size for adults. Hat is adjustable for Mrs potatoe head. Hat is standard size adult for Mr potatoe head. Pictures vibrant and stick well to material. Item is even better in person.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: The male part was used & stuck together
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased this in the mail section had been used all the protective paper over the tape was missing from the Mail costume and it was completely stuck to all the other pieces and unusable. Unfortunately I didn’t notice because I Purchased it after Halloween and opened it the following
customer_reviews.author: Puregrace

customer_reviews.title: Loved this costume!!!
customer_reviews.text: These were the hit of the night!! Very good quick costume that worked great for Toy Story trunk or treat theme. Everyone loved them!! The stickers stayed on all might with no problem. The quality was very good. The one flaw was that Mrs. Potato heads hat said Mr. Potato head, so I used a sharpie to draw the S on.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this! It was a simple peel and stick stickers. You do have to buy a separate shirt to stick those stickers on.
customer_reviews.author: Xoxo_Christlyn

customer_reviews.title: This comes with both male and female stickers. We ...
customer_reviews.text: This comes with both male and female stickers. We bought brown long sleeve t-shirts and stuck these stickers on them. You will need to use a shirt that you do not care to use again. My only complaint is that the hats were squished. I received many compliments on this unique costume!
customer_reviews.author: lel022190

customer_reviews.title: Cute his & hers costume
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute and easy costume. It's a set of stickers for both Mr. And Mrs. Potato head faces and their hats. The stickers easily apply to any shirt you choose. My husband is going as Mr. Potato Head and I'll be Mrs. Potato Head for Halloween. Awesome price for two costumes!
customer_reviews.author: lele83

customer_reviews.title: Easy costume.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy costume you just have to buy shirts to attach the pieces. Everyone complimented how cute it was.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lumb

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I guess I'm Mr. Potatoe head! This is ridiculous 😡 😤 plus nothing is sticking on correctly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These were great. My husband and I used for Halloween costume. They stick well and the hats fit as expected. Would buy again. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: selin yarian

customer_reviews.title: Missing Mrs. Potato Head lips!!
customer_reviews.text: We were not given lips for Mrs. Potato Head. Hoping the company will send a new one out to us ASAP. Otherwise it’s all fine quality. They’re stickers you put on a shirt if your choice. Hats are a little on the small side.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Easy costume
customer_reviews.text: Looked cute. Sturdy felt stickers and not too smushed hats, wearable but needed some reshaping. Must be due to the shrink wrapped exterior packaging. It was an easy costume! Brown top and go!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen H. Rippey

customer_reviews.title: Super Sticky Stickers - Otherwise great costume
customer_reviews.text: My cousin and I wore these costumes for the Disney Marathon. I had read the previous reviews about the stickers ruining clothing and they are not exaggerating. After washing my tank twice, I took a steelwool pad to it to get rid of the gummy residue, it pilled up the tank but it's just a running tank not a cashmere sweater. I would plan and simply disposing of whatever shirt you use. Yes, the hats came kind of crinkly but some steam from the iron took care it quite readily. So easy, so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Mcduffie

customer_reviews.title: Mrs. potato head....??
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty bummed out that Mrs potato heads hat says mr potato head. I’m going to have to try to fix it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina S.

customer_reviews.title: Leaves residue on tshirt but great product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: They are just sticker but they work really well! Make sure to use a tshirt you don't really care about because they will STICK VERY WELL and may ruin or leave residue on the tshirt!
customer_reviews.author: KTV

customer_reviews.title: Cute Costume
customer_reviews.text: Great costume. This only comes with stickers and hats. You must buy the shirts separately. Pretty cheap quality but most costumes are. I would recommend this costume.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Gilvin

customer_reviews.title: Defective product - printing issue
customer_reviews.text: The product says Mr. instead of Mrs. on the female hat.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Opened the package this morning and discovered there were two noses for Mr Potato Head but eyes and teeth are missing for Mrs Potato Head. We have two partys tomorrow and the next day so too late to get corrected.
customer_reviews.author: Dexter

customer_reviews.title: Cute costume
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use sticky pieces. Went on my shirts perfect and stayed on!
customer_reviews.author: Ceallee

customer_reviews.title: Great but left sticky residue
customer_reviews.text: Easily stuck on and stayed but when I went to peel off my clothing 6ish hours later it left a lot of sticky residue of my clothing
customer_reviews.author: McCall

customer_reviews.title: Both hats say Mr. Potato head!?
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that the hat for Mrs Potato head says Mr. potato Head..... The hats are also are not very sturdy, but still a versatile and fun couples costume
customer_reviews.author: Katie Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent costume at an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: We needed a quick costume and didn't want to spend very much and this fit the bill perfectly. We just put the stickers on long sleeve brown t shirts and voila - instant costumes for my husband and I. Bonus was that we were able to wear warm clothes underneath them for outside activities.
customer_reviews.author: PAL

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Stickers held well. Super surprised by quality. Mustache was folded and left weird folding mark. Worth price.
customer_reviews.author: AvdH

customer_reviews.title: Nice reasonable couple costume
customer_reviews.text: The stickers and hats was just right. Hats fit well. Didn’t get a picture of the Mr. Potato head stickers and hat.
customer_reviews.author: K. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Cool design but doesnt stick very well
customer_reviews.text: It didnt stick to the shirts very well, I thought it would be stronger glue
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Better than how I expected it! Stickers stuck very well to the shirt I bought. I wore this costume multiple times and the stickers never lost their stickiness. Paired with white gloves to give the full effect.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt England

customer_reviews.title: my adult kids enjoyed, them for a themed party
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest thing, my adult kids enjoyed, them for a themed party, toy story would not be complete with the mr &mrs potatoes. Thanks great service
customer_reviews.author: Nanaclause

customer_reviews.title: You get Mr and Mrs so 2 for 1
customer_reviews.text: Halloween it was perfect just place on a t shirt and your done
customer_reviews.author: LISA From fl

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price and simple yet cute!
customer_reviews.text: Was what we expected and surprisingly easy to stick onto the shirts we purchased. The sticker part was much stickier than we thought they would be so that was good. They stayed on all day.
customer_reviews.author: POM

customer_reviews.title: missing a couple things
customer_reviews.text: Package was missing Mrs. Potato lips, I used Mr Potato teeth beings he had a mustache. Also Mrs. Potato hat was missing s. it said Mr. Potato instead of Mrs. Potato. All in all I liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply & stays on well. Perfect for a quick cute costume!
customer_reviews.author: Alex H

customer_reviews.title: We had fun
customer_reviews.text: It fit as described and easy to use. We had fun
customer_reviews.author: Edgardo

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Returned immediately as the female hat said ‘Mr’ Hats were flimsy too Sad that Disney did such a poor job
customer_reviews.author: YaYaYa

customer_reviews.title: Hats in bad condition
customer_reviews.text: Cute stickers. Horrible packaging. Hats are wrinkled and it’s very hard to bring them back to original shape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: My product came and was missing the eyes for the Mrs Potato head portion.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Johanson

customer_reviews.title: easy but cute costume
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to dress as a toy story character to match my kids. This was the perfect costume for my husband and I. We used old brown s***s and stuck this to it. They held great and looked great.
customer_reviews.author: leah

customer_reviews.title: No mr potato head hat
customer_reviews.text: Mrs potato was fine but mr potato head didn’t come with his hat like it was supposed. I would’ve sent it back but the package came too close to Halloween for me to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Nia Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Fun and no fuss!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect halloween costume for the parents who want to be part of the fun without any fuss!! We bought brown shirts to wear under the stickers. The hats make the outfit!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Lee Watson

customer_reviews.title: Decals are great; hats are large
customer_reviews.text: The decals worked great, but the hats were too big for me and my husband so we found alternatives. Still worth it. Did Toy Story Halloween with our family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Creased Pieces
customer_reviews.text: The pieces are great except they weren't packaged well! Everything has major creases! I'm glad I wasn't planning to use the hats because they're crushed beyond repair. They look like trash.
customer_reviews.author: Julie C

customer_reviews.title: Pleased, even though they were "defective."
customer_reviews.text: They did their job! I purchased brown tshirts to stick these on. The men's hat looked dorky and the women's hat said, "Mr. Potato Head." It wasn't enough to get me to return them. We still received lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie G

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: The accessories for this costume were perfect! Got myself a plain shirt and stuck all the pieces on! Worked out great
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer_3

customer_reviews.title: T-shirt not included
customer_reviews.text: The t-shirt is not included in the package. That is not clear for me when saw the offer page.
customer_reviews.author: Leandro

customer_reviews.title: Easy and cute costume
customer_reviews.text: my husband and I wore these cute costumes at a music festival last year during Halloween and loved them.........they were easy to put together using your own t-shirt in the color of your choice.........if you're looking for a cheap, easy to wear, fun costume..........this is the one for you
customer_reviews.author: M. B. Agee

customer_reviews.title: Ripped mustache
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived with all specified pieces. However the mustache for Mr Potato head was ripped. Which is unfortunate since it is listed as new
customer_reviews.author: melissa martin

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: These turned out perfect! The adhesive was good, stickers stayed on with no trouble. Excellent price- one set created both of these costumes.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Worked well, since it’s only stickers size was not ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked well, since it’s only stickers size was not an isssue. Got laughs at the party, especially since you can place each piece wherever you want.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Drozda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: cute and I liked it was a little loose fitting
customer_reviews.author: susier

customer_reviews.title: Great for Halooween or Birthday parties
customer_reviews.text: Cute. Easy to use. I'm a grandma who wanted us to dress up for my grandson bday party theme. This was something grandpa agree on instead of heavy custom in hot summer
customer_reviews.author: Bel

customer_reviews.title: Great costume deal
customer_reviews.text: It stuck on well through several wears. We bought nude sweaters for this costume and it worked great
customer_reviews.author: Maria Elena Villalobos

customer_reviews.title: ... concerned with your clothing~ the product is cute and easily applied, but when removing it left all the ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this product if you are concerned with your clothing~ the product is cute and easily applied, but when removing it left all the glue from the backing on my blouse and completely ruined it! Although it only costs around $20 it cost me $65 in clothing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super easy and fun
customer_reviews.text: We had a costume party to attend. It was perfect, enough to feel in costume but not over bearing.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy A. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This kit went beyond what I was expecting for the price. It came with the hats and I wasn't expecting the hats to be with it. This is going to be a great costume for the price.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sipes

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Does not stick to any type of shirt... The “mrs” potato hat came as “mr”. My 4 month old son could make a better product
customer_reviews.author: Ann Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are going to a camp banquet as Mr. and Mrs. Potato Head...we haven't used it yet, but I like what I see. We will supplement with different hats. I'll let you know the response we get after camp. :)
customer_reviews.author: Anne Benton

customer_reviews.title: Great Costume
customer_reviews.text: Great last minute purchase as a costume...for those of use who don't like to dress up. It was comfortable and everyone knew who I was. Use a shirt that you don't mind losing the glue does stick and leave residue.
customer_reviews.author: Paula H.

customer_reviews.title: Hat name is spelled wrong.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use the Mrs. Potato head. Unfortunately the hat is mis-spelled. It’s says “Mr” instead of “Mrs”.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Wrong hat title
customer_reviews.text: The hat actually says Mr. Potato head, not Mrs. Plus the stickers will not stick to fabric well.
customer_reviews.author: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great easy Halloween costume. Paired with kids in toy story costumes, made for a simple family costume!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A

customer_reviews.title: Classic Halloween Fun
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! A party favorite:) You really can’t reuse is the only downside
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: This was awesome. Very easy to use! Peel and stick on your own shirts. We did it for toy story theme Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Lozj

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this five stars if the tshirt had come with
customer_reviews.author: Tim Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect hat
customer_reviews.text: Mrs. PotatoHead hat actually says “Mr” on it. Does not come shown as advertised. Pretty disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Good product bad glue.
customer_reviews.text: Great costume but the glue from the sticker will ruin your shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Price

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Such an awesome deal for so many pieces. It's perfect for adult costumes, you don't have to go too far out of your way to have an awesome costume! (includes male and female pieces)
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: It worked perfectly for my teacher costume. Sticky enough to last all day.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love the costume. The stickers stuck on to the shirt great too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect easy halloween costume to take my toy story kid trick or treating :)
customer_reviews.author: Ali Berger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for packing
customer_reviews.text: We needed to pack a costume for a vacation trip, and the potato head couple worked beautifully for us! The stickers firmly secured to our t shirts, and easily peeled off.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Kukla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this. Came with hats and stickers. It was the hit of the party. Super easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: very cute quick and easy costume. just a little bit on the pricey side for a few stickers...
customer_reviews.author: md

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Quality
customer_reviews.text: The product was very cheaply made, and the spelling was wrong on the hats.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a fun holloween costume easy to customize on what your going ot wear with it
customer_reviews.author: E. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: The package was missing Mrs. Potato head’s nose. Super disappointed
customer_reviews.author: The Rodriguez family

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy and fun just peel and stick on your own tshirt!
customer_reviews.author: A Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: easy
customer_reviews.text: Well, it was easy to apply and no costume make-up to clean off. Overall an no fuss Halloween costume and no one recognized me in it! WOW!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to-go costume for my nephews Toy Story themed birthday! Includes MR. & MRS. Potato head stickers!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Aflak Colon

customer_reviews.title: Great for Toy Story Theme
customer_reviews.text: The stickers are super Cute planned on using it for Halloween we did Toy Story Theme. Our kids were Buzz and Woody. Never got the stickers. don't buy from this seller
customer_reviews.author: MomRN3

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Was great until I put them on. Mrs. Potato heads mouth had no adhesive. I had to use safety pins to attach it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Traynor

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: These stickers worked great for all of the Halloween events I attended with my son who went as Woody. I put the stickers on an old t-shirt and was good to go.
customer_reviews.author: MommyJ82

customer_reviews.title: Easy Costume!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great and easy way to make a costume. We used a couple of brown tee shirts and we became Mr and Mrs potatoe head.
customer_reviews.author: Joe IMHO

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: worked great for a quick, last minute, adult costume. Will save for Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: scl

customer_reviews.title: stickers!
customer_reviews.text: These were felt-like stickers and worked well on a orange-ish t-shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Mtn.Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very inexpensive, good quality, fast shipping, super easy Halloween costume.
customer_reviews.author: AZAO

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect. The sticky doesn't fall off at all even ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it for our family halloween toy story theme. It was perfect. The sticky doesn't fall off at all even while holding a baby the whole evening
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: BOO!!!
customer_reviews.text: Was great! Thanks now we can be the toy story crew for halloween
customer_reviews.author: Anayeli1

customer_reviews.title: Mrs. Potato head hat
customer_reviews.text: The Mrs. potato head hat says mr. potato head but other than that it seems fine
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So cute and great for couples costume. Got a lot of compliments
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Super cute costume
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to put the stickers on something you don't care about. Super cute costume, but my husband put on a nice vest and sticky stuff won't come off and I have tried everything, but all in all great costume.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: COSTUME
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS!! THIS WAS A GREAT HIT AT MY SONS 2 YEAR OLD BIRTHDAY PARTY! HIS AND HERS! PERFECT COSTUME!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great costume
customer_reviews.text: This was a great and easy costume idea for Halloween. I put the decals on a brown shirt and wore long sleeve white underneath
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Quick no fuss costume.
customer_reviews.text: The custom was great and got many compliments. Quick and easy! However, Do not stick it to a shirt or dress that you ever want to wear again. The adhesive tape left reside on my dress. I even took the dress to the cleaners and they were not able to get all the residue/ tape off. the dress is now ruined.
customer_reviews.author: April Ohler

customer_reviews.title: So fun for halloween
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend and I for halloween, we loved it. The adhesive was pretty strong and the hats fit nicely. One word of advice: don't put the pieces on a shirt you want to wear again. I loved being Mrs. Potato Head but the adhesive from the parts ruined the shirt I was wearing. I would buy this again and recommend this product in addition to a sacrificial shirt too.
customer_reviews.author: Cjohns2

customer_reviews.title: I loved it.
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect. I bought it at last minute. I safety pinned this to my shirt. No one new who I was (Mrs. Potatoe) by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Stasi Williams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and an easy costume to make. I sewed a felt shirt to put it on.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA BROADAWAY

customer_reviews.title: Good quick costume
customer_reviews.text: Good costume that can be assembled quickly. The stickers are a permanent adhesive, so they can not be moved around.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

product_meta.title: Disguise Women's Hasbro Game Mr. Mrs. Potato Head Costume Kit
feature_bullets: Quality materials used to make Disguise products
Fun, Colorful, Inventive designs to put you in the world of role play
Whether it's Halloween, birthday parties, or even a fun filled night, disguise is good for everything!
